name: Love will find a way (vitorascorrea)
description:
(Entry for https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-120-hell)

Oh what a sad day it was
When Cupid fell for the tricks of hell

Devils watching over every step
Ready to throw the little angel back into its cell

But courage was not lost from the Cupid's heart
Because love was his most powerful spell

With only one arrow from the quiver left
This unexpected escape story we will tell

How to play

Use left mouse button to click in adjacent tiles and charm devils. Avoid the devils sight and reach for the goal, your only weapon is love.

Limitation

The theme for this jam is "The player must not harm". The game revolves around Cupid's using his Love Arrow to charm devils, distracting them while escaping the stages of hell.

Credits

- Design, Art and Code by vitorascorrea
- Music downloaded from https://freesound.org/people/neolein
- Cover image by DALL E 2
